footer.slogan: Your trusted guide to finding the perfect freelance platform for your skills.

hero.title: Find Your Perfect
hero.subtitle: Compare Upwork, Fiverr, Toptal, and 20+ platforms. Honest reviews to help you succeed.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Find your perfect freelance platform in three simple steps
howItWorks.step1Description: Explore our comprehensive reviews of 25+ freelance platforms, each analyzed for features, fees, and user experience.
howItWorks.step2Description: Use our side-by-side comparisons to evaluate platforms based on your skills, experience level, and work preferences.
howItWorks.step3Description: Sign up for your chosen platform with confidence, armed with expert insights and real user experiences.
howItWorks.ctaDescription: Join 1,000+ freelancers who found their perfect platform through our reviews

topRatedPlatforms.title: Top Rated Platforms
topRatedPlatforms.description: Our highest-rated freelance marketplaces based on user reviews and ratings

featuredPlatforms.title: Latest Blog Posts
featuredPlatforms.description: Discover our latest articles, guides and tips for freelancers

platformComparison.title: Compare Top Platforms
platformComparison.description: Side-by-side comparison of the most popular freelance marketplaces

trendingTopics.title: Trending Topics
trendingTopics.description: What freelancers are reading right now

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.description: Join thousands of freelancers who found their perfect platform through our reviews
testimonials.testimonial1Quote: SkillLinkup helped me understand which platform was best for my design skills. I'm now earning 40% more than my previous job!
testimonials.testimonial2Quote: The detailed comparison saved me weeks of research. I found the perfect platform match on my first try thanks to their expert insights.
testimonials.testimonial3Quote: As a beginner freelancer, the platform reviews gave me confidence to start. The tips and guidance were invaluable for my journey.
testimonials.testimonial4Quote: I've tried 5 different platforms, and SkillLinkup's reviews were spot-on for each one. This is my go-to resource for freelance platform info.
testimonials.testimonial5Quote: The honest pros and cons helped me avoid platforms that wouldn't suit my style. Now I'm working with clients who truly value my work.
testimonials.testimonial6Quote: Clear, unbiased reviews with actual data. No fluff, just facts. Exactly what I needed to make an informed decision about my freelance career.

latestReviews.title: Latest Guides
latestReviews.description: Stay updated with our newest platform reviews

newsletter.title: Get Weekly Freelance Tips
newsletter.description: Join 1,000+ freelancers receiving weekly platform reviews and insider tips.

metadata.title: Freelance Tools & Resources | SkillLinkup
metadata.description: Discover useful tools and calculators for freelancers. Calculate your rates, track your time and more.

hero.title: Freelance Tools & Resources
hero.subtitle: Useful tools and calculators to help you run your freelance business more efficiently.

toolsSection.title: Free Freelance Tools
toolsSection.description: Use our tools to calculate your rates, track your time and organize your business.

timeTracker.name: Time Tracker
timeTracker.description: Track your billable hours and generate reports for your clients

rateCalculator.name: Rate Calculator

invoiceGenerator.name: Invoice Generator

resourcesSection.title: Downloads & Resources
resourcesSection.description: Useful templates and guides to help you get started.

emptyStates.noResources: No resources found. Check back soon!

cta.title: Don't miss new tools!
cta.description: We're constantly working on new tools to make your freelance life easier. Sign up for updates.

hero.title: Time Tracker
hero.subtitle: Track billable hours, manage projects, and calculate earnings automatically. Perfect for freelancers and consultants.

projects.title: Projects
projects.empty: No projects yet. Add one to get started!

entries.title: Time Entries
entries.empty: No time entries yet. Start the timer or add a manual entry!

confirmations.deleteProject: Delete this project? This will not affect existing time entries.

hero.title: Freelance Rate Calculator
hero.description: Calculate your ideal hourly rate based on your desired income, expenses, and billable hours. This calculator accounts for taxes and a buffer for unexpected costs.

inputs.title: Your Information
inputs.customRateHelpEnabled: Using custom rate to calculate your potential income
inputs.customRateHelpDisabled: Click Enable to enter your own hourly rate and see your potential income
inputs.helpDesiredIncome: The amount you want to earn net per year
inputs.helpBusinessExpenses: Software, hardware, office, insurance, accountant, etc.
inputs.helpSafetyBuffer: Extra buffer for unexpected costs and slower periods
inputs.helpVacationWeeks: Typical 4-6 weeks per year for work-life balance

project.title: Project Price Calculator
project.description: Estimate project price based on your hourly rate
project.bufferTip: Consider adding 10-20% buffer for scope changes

tips.title: Tips for setting your rate
tips.tip1: Compare your rate with the market in your industry
tips.tip2: Consider your experience and expertise level
tips.tip3: Don't start too low - raising rates is harder than lowering them
tips.tip5: Review and adjust rates annually for inflation
tips.tip6: Different rates for different client types is common

understanding.title: Understanding Your Rate
understanding.incomeExplain: Your target take-home pay for the year
understanding.bufferExplain: Protection against slow periods and unexpected costs
understanding.taxesExplain: Income tax, VAT, and other applicable taxes
understanding.hoursExplain: Not all work hours are billable (admin, sales, etc.)

cta.title: Need more help with your freelance business?
cta.description: Discover our other tools and read our comprehensive guides on pricing and freelancing.

metadata.title: About Us - SkillLinkup
metadata.description: Learn about SkillLinkup's mission to help freelancers find the perfect platform for their skills.

hero.title: Helping Freelancers Find Their Perfect Platform
hero.subtitle: We believe every freelancer deserves to work on a platform that matches their skills, experience level, and career goals. That's why we created SkillLinkup.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: The freelance economy is booming, with hundreds of platforms competing for your attention. Each platform has different fee structures, client types, and approval processes.
mission.paragraph2: SkillLinkup cuts through the noise with honest, data-driven reviews and comparisons. We help you make informed decisions so you can focus on what you do best: your work.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.item1: Review 25+ freelance platforms with real data
whatWeDo.item3: Share expert tips and success strategies
whatWeDo.item4: Keep you updated on platform changes

honest.title: Honest Reviews
honest.description: We provide unbiased, data-driven reviews with real pros and cons. No sugar-coating, just honest insights.

data.title: Data-Driven
data.description: Every review is backed by real data: fee structures, approval rates, average earnings, and user satisfaction.

community.title: Community First
community.description: We're built by freelancers, for freelancers. Your success is our success, and we're here to support your journey.

team.title: Built by Freelancers, For Freelancers
team.description: Our team consists of experienced freelancers who have worked across multiple platforms. We know the challenges you face because we've faced them ourselves.

hero.title: Invoice Generator
hero.subtitle: Create professional invoices instantly. Save, print, and download as PDF.
hero.tagline: Perfect for freelancers and small businesses.

messages.invalidImage: Please select a valid image file
